document_name: Ministerial Order No. 6579 establishing the Technical Committee for disaster risk declaration
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/SEN/2009/SEN-2009-06-29-Ministerial Order No. 6579 establishing the Technical Committee for disaster risk declaration_62fc8aaea7f967314e925bf69c442b82.pdf
document_description: This Ministerial Order creates the Technical Committee of Verification which is responsible for reporting and verifying natural calamities affecting rural areas and causing disaster losses to farms, livestock, forestry and fishing. It establishes the composition and functions of the Technical Committee.
